about_the_game:
Bounce to the beat of different music genres, and save your missing mushroom friends!

Mushroom Musical is a colorful platformer game, with two game modes: adventure and challenge.
In adventure mode, you are searching for your mushroom friends through forests, fields, oceans and factories.
The better you are in adventure mode, the more skins and adventure/challenge levels you unlock.
Each adventure level has its own music genre. Examples of level names: Jellyfish Jazz, Bumblebee Blues.
The challenge levels is where you can test yourself to see for how long you can avoid enemies.
If you get good at it, it´s also a way to unlock skins.
There are 3 worlds, 9 adventure levels, 1 boss level, and 3 challenge levels.

This game is also available on android.

Wishlist the next game in the same genre: Balls & Beats!

name: Mushroom Musical

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 1260 MB available space

short_description: A colorful and difficult rhythm platformer game.
